Summary: Very large disc with two smaller disks ejected,
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Waynesburg
There were no other sightings in Waynesburg on or around June 1st 1957
divs: sighting detailson a clear summer afternoon in the mid to late 50s, my friends and i were outside playing a game. we were at the top of a small hill where the horizon was visible on all sides. one of us happened to look up at the sky and we all then clearly saw a very large silver, saucer shaped object which hovered completely still in one part of the sky for about half an hour. two smaller silver discs (the same shape) then appeared from the underside of the saucer and quickly disappeared on the other side of the horizon. these smaller saucers were probably about the size of a football field, about 1\10 the size of the larger object. the large saucer continued to hover for about 15 minutes. finally i looked away for no longer than the time to turn my head, and the larger object had already moved clear to the other side of the horizon and then disappeared from view.
